history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Francis
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Francis of actions
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to j francis company, llc. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Hello.
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER I'm leaving from Fifth and Atwood.
TTS Okay, leaving from fifth avenue and atwood st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER 4 P.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 49 minutes, and you will take 2 busses..
Take the 61C to Sixth avenue at Wood St. It will depart at 4:10pm..
Walk for about 1 min to Liberty avenue at 7th St..
Take the 6 to Rhine St at Itin St FS. It will depart at 4:36pm..
Walk for about 8 mins to 1410 High St, Pittsburgh, PA 15212, USA..
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
